attributes.action: Allow 3 o clock football to be televised
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair that an English football league being played in England cannot be televised on English television yet the rest of the world can watch!
attributes.background: I would like the goverment to contact the football governing body to cancel the 3pm ban on veiwing.

rejection.details:
Decisions about when to hold and broadcast football matches are a matter for the FA, the Premier League and the Football League, and broadcasters, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
